alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Vermillion (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 4:29PM EDT until May 15 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fountain County in west central Indiana... Northwestern Parke County in west central Indiana... Central Vermillion County in west central Indiana... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 429 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, or 20 miles southeast of Danville, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Kingman around 440 PM EDT. Turkey Run State Park around 445 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Yeddo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
